content.chorus:
Nara, nara, nara, aja biko Chukwu
Aja anyi n'erunyere Gi maka ndi din du na ndi nwuru anwu
Ka aja nke a anyi ji akwu ugwo mmeghie
Meda gi obi maka njo anyi
verses:
O Chukwu anyi .d-ario ka iwere ebere
Nekwasi anya n'onyinye nyin'ebunye
Gi Makaezumike na nzoputa nwaodibo Gi

Nye ya onodu ebebe n'etiti ndi nke gi
Azoputagoro, nuru nuru aririo any
Oh oh-naranu onyinye anyi, Oh Chukwu
